channel.title: Running and strafing at the same time
channel.description:
Hi,
I can't seem to run and strafe at the same time in BM - I'm pretty sure you can in all the other games, as I've realised it's how I move about and look around most of the time, and not being able to do it feels really awkward.
Has anyone else noticed this? Will there be a way to change it or is it programmed in?

item.title: Running and strafing at the same time

Read full topic
